txt.en: 'I don't know what happened... all of a sudden they were everywhere.'
'Have you seen Richard? No one's seen him since the attack. If you find his... if you find him, let us know.'
'Where did all those brigands come from, and where did they get all their equipment?'
'Foul brigands stole, killed, or burned everything they could get their hands on.'
'Watch yourself, stranger. We don't kindly to roustabouts.'
'Wish I knew what Peg's been feeding us. I think it's meat, but I ain't seen no cows butchered in weeks.'
